channel.title: Leaflet on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Leaflet on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Maps with Leaflet and LeafletR
item.description: style leaflet(data="/Users/emv/tmp/N.geojson",dest=tempdir(),popup="*",style=style) So, progress. One process, written in python, takes an Excel file provided by the county and creates a GeoJSON file from it. Addresses in the file are geocoded. The original file has a set of restaurant inspection reports and three kinds of inspection problems found; I add a fourth "score" variable that's derived in some way from those three. A second process (code above) is in R using the LeafletR graphing package.
